name: Tanner

name: Thug

name: Prophet
ability: If you played an event as your action and it didn’t end the round, you may play another event.
effect: Weakest players -1g for each barbarian in the demand pile.

name: Quarry
ability: You may develop once per turn as a free action.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card for each science you provide..

name: Armory
ability: Before contracts are paid, take 2g from the treasury.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card for each science you provide..

name: Bank
ability: When the treasury runs out of money, you get 2g,
effect: Treasury -1g for each barbarian in the demand pile.

name: Lodge
ability: When you start a business, you may open it immediately, discard Lodge, and return one of its contract cards.
effect: Treasury -1g for each barbarian in the demand pile.

name: Mercenary
ability: When barbarians attack, add 1 to their number and gain 1g.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population, otherwise -1 population.

name: Laboratory
ability: If you draw a card with science demand, reveal it and gain 4g.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population, otherwise -1 population.

name: Spear Maker
ability: When opened, you may put a card from the demand pile as a contract on any business.
effect: Each player discards 1 business and returns one of its contract cards to the demand pile.

name: Inventor
ability: After starting a business, draw a card, then discard.
effect: Players gain 1g per hide they provide.

name: Tower
ability: Whenever you play an event, gain 1g.
effect: Players gain +2g per stone they provide.

name: Hay Maker
ability: You may play one event per turn as a free action.
effect: Players gain +2g per stone they provide.

name: Spearman
ability: EOTR (end of the round): play one more action.
effect: Treasury -2g for each barbarian in the demand pile.

name: Fruit Stand
ability: EOTR (end of the round): If you provide more food than anyone, gain 2g.
effect: Treasury -2g for each barbarian in the demand pile.

name: Trade Post
ability: For each business you have when this is opened (including this), gain 1g.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card and place a card in the demand pile.

name: Bronze Mine
ability: Gain 1g at the beginning of your turn unless Bronze Mine has a contract.
effect: Treasury -2g for each barbarian in the demand pile.

name: Market
ability: On your turn, you may treat Market’s good or happiness provisions as any resource for contracting purposes.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population, otherwise -1 population.

name: Knight
ability: When you play an event, you may place it at the bottom of the future events instead.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card and place a card in the demand pile.

name: Union
ability: Other players must pay you 3-2-1g to close a business (2p-3p-4p).
effect: Draw a card and add it to the demand pile.

name: Sword Maker
ability: You gain gold stolen by Barbarian events.
effect: Treasury -2g for each barbarian in the demand pile.

name: Temple
ability: After you resolve an event, if there are any cards to draw, draw a card and discard.
effect: Treasury +6g

name: Dairy Farm
ability: You may start one business per turn as a free action.
effect: Players providing bronze may sell a business and draw a card.

name: Warehouse
ability: You always draw a card at the end of your turn.
effect: Players gain +3g per bronze they provide.

name: Bard
ability: When taking a contract, you may use one happiness demand in place of any other resource.
effect: Players gain +3g per bronze they provide.

name: Castle
ability: To open, you must first discard a stone business and return one of its contract cards to the demand pile.
effect: Discard the oldest happiness demanded

name: Butcher
ability: When opened, you may add a card from your hand to the demand pile.
effect: If there are 2 or more barbarians, treasury loses 1/3 its gold rounded down and civ -1 pop.

name: Accountant
ability: Your contract payouts are increased by 1.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card and place a card in the demand pile.

name: Grocer
ability: To open, you must first discard a food business and return one of its contract cards to the demand pile.
effect: Players providing the most science (not zero): draw a card and place a card in the demand pile.

name: Trader
ability: When a non-barbarian is added to the demand pile, gain 1g.
effect: Treasury -3g for each barbarian in the demand pile.

name: Gravedigger
ability: When built, add two cards from the discard pile to the demand pile.
effect: Treasury -3g for each barbarian in the demand pile.

name: Monastery
ability: When drawing, you may draw the revealed event or the top card of the demand pile.
effect: If there’s no food in the demand pile, +1 population, otherwise -1 population.

name: Cotton Mill
ability: AAA (as an action): add any number of cards to the demand pile from your hand.
effect: Remove the oldest 2 barbarian icons from the demand pile.

name: Cafe
ability: You have an extra action each turn.
effect: Treasury +8g

name: Army
ability: Your contracts are paid for from the supply if the treasury is exhausted.
effect: Players providing cloth: +5g

name: Security
ability: EOTR (end of the round): earn 3g from a weaker player.
effect: If there are 2 or more barbarians, treasury loses 1/3 its gold rounded down and civ -1 pop.

name: Clothier
ability: When contracted, gain 2g for each type of resource you provide.
effect: Civ loses 10g, reduced 3-2-1g per happiness provided by players (2p-3p-4p).

name: Museum
ability: When opened, keep age [] development cards underneath.  Museum’s contract is +2g per card underneath.
effect: Uncontracted businesses earn 3g each

name: University
ability: When drawing, you may draw the top card of the discard pile.  When you do, gain 2g.
effect: Discard all barbarians
